
About
=====

**sphinx-refdoc** is a python reference documentation generator for Sphinx.


Installation
============

.. code-block:: shell

    $ pip install sphinx-refdoc


Contributing
============

Setting up development repo
---------------------------

.. code-block:: shell

    $ git clone git@github.com:novopl/sphinx-refdoc.git
    $ cd sphinx-refdoc
    $ virtualenv env
    $ source ./env/bin/activate
    $ ./devinit.sh
